word_letter_focus.title: Grammar: More Pronouns
word_letter_focus.directions: Highlight the word indicated before each sentence.

sentence.text: Choose the interrogative pronoun: {wh}Who{/wh} are you here to see?
Choose the relative pronoun: Science is the subject {wh}that{/wh} I like best.
Choose the interrogative pronoun: He is the guide {wh}who{/wh} gave us the tour.
Choose the interrogative pronoun: {wh}Which{/wh} door leads to the exit?
Choose the relative pronoun: This is the book {wh}that{/wh} I read.
Choose the interrogative pronoun: {wh}What{/wh} song would you like to hear?
Choose the interrogative pronoun: She is the girl {wh}whose{/wh} father runs the gas station.
Choose the interrogative pronoun: To {wh}whom{/wh} are you speaking?
Choose the demonstrative pronoun: {wh}This{/wh} is the cell phone I was hoping to find.
Choose the indefinite pronoun: {wh}Everyone{/wh} was looking for it.
Choose the demonstrative pronoun: {wh}These{/wh} are the messages on her phone.
Choose the indefinite pronoun: A {wh}few{/wh} of her friends left text messages.
Choose the demonstrative pronoun: {wh}That{/wh} is David’s home next to ours.
Choose the demonstrative pronoun: {wh}These{/wh} are the bushes that separate our yards.
Choose the indefinite pronoun: {wh}Both{/wh} of us go to the same school.
Choose the indefinite pronoun: {wh}Everybody{/wh} says our school is the best.
Choose the indefinite pronoun: {wh}Everyone{/wh} was invited to Laura’s birthday party.
Choose the relative pronoun: This is the birthday cake {wh}that{/wh} her mother made.
Choose the indefinite pronoun: {wh}Many{/wh} of the guests brought a gift for the birthday girl.
Choose the indefinite pronoun: {wh}No one{/wh} told Laura, so the party was a surprise.
Choose the interrogative pronoun: {wh}Who{/wh} is going to the school dance?
Choose the interrogative pronoun: Jackie Riley is the DJ {wh}whom{/wh} the principal hired.
Choose the relative pronoun: He used to play in a band {wh}that{/wh} performed at weddings.
Choose the interrogative pronoun: {wh}What{/wh} clothes should I wear to the dance?
